content:
**Doji x Ethereum**

**Very first ETH price data generated NFT**

Doji is a collection of 2020 pieces of unique animated cards generated based on the Ethereum historical price data.
Each NFT represents a day of ETH trading, only 2020 trade day so far since ETH launched. 
Plus good roadmap ahead with DAO and more...

Join our Discord server:  https://discord.gg/KSSMUkeY8f
https://cdn.doji.dev/demo1.gif
